pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, June 12, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Cornwall, United Kingdom

Private meetings.

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

Canadian Bilateral Meeting Room
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session II entitled “Building Back Resilient”.

Plenary Room, Second Floor
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster, host photographer, and official photographer only

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session III entitled “Building Back Resilient: Foreign Policy”.

Plenary Room, Second Floor
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster, host photographer, and official photographer only

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Italy, Mario Draghi.

Canadian Bilateral Meeting Room
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session IV with Outreach Countries entitled “Building Back Stronger: Health”.

Plenary Room, Second Floor
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster, host photographer, and official photographer only

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chancellor of Germany, Angela Merkel.

Canadian Bilateral Meeting Room
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 family photo with Outreach Leaders.

Beach Restaurant
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster and host photographer only

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G7 Leaders’ Dinner with Outreach Countries, hosted by the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

Beach Restaurant
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Host photographer only
